oxygen_production_rate_kg_per_day.verification_notes: Confirmed from ESA (authoritative): 'up to 9 kg of oxygen per day during continuous operation and a normal rate of about 5.5 kg of oxygen per day during cyclic operation'. JSON value 5.4 kg is close to the 5.5 kg cyclic rate
oxygen_production_rate_kg_per_day.notes: Normal rate is 12 lbs (5.4 kg) per day, can produce 5-20 lbs (2.3-9 kg) per day

items.heritage: ISS operational since 2007, 23,000+ lbs oxygen generated

items.notes: Uses water electrolysis to produce oxygen and hydrogen. Hydrogen fed to Sabatier reactor.
